Image.Text: Welcome to ChemCraft, a world where chemical compounds are alive and sentient! Who am I? Well perhaps a better question would be Where am I!

BOOM! I am a Methane molecule! I came from the beaker you had over the bunsen burner. On that note, you really should not place methane over fire. I'm highly flammable and if you were a little closer you would've gotten caught in my explosion. Lab safety is key.
Anyway, I'll be your guide and first chemical friend in your journey!. Oh boy, I can already feel the chemistry between us!
Your other best friend in this journey will be your JOURNAL. Your journal has all sorts of useful information, and is accessible through by pressing 'ENTER'.
Through your INFO menu, you'll have info about your party members. Namely me!
